info.brief_description: The story is simple. Your character is named Alfred F. Jones from hetalia!
info.description:
Alright this story is pretty much point and go. YOur name is ALfred F. Jones from the anime Hetalia! You are the country of america!
You have been shuirnk down to teh size of an inch with a shrink ray gun your boss told you to get rid of but you decided to play with it instead. Now you have to get back to normal!
Please no heavey scat in this. No real ahrd core sex or hard vore. Other than that everytihg goes!
